item.title: Pandan chiffon cake
item.description: Recently, I attended a cake baking class and learnt to make a pandan chiffon cake. While I can’t fully recreate the cake due to the absence of some ingredients, I listed down alternatives that can still help make a great cake. Ingredients Flavoured mix: Weight Item Notes 30g Egg yolk Approx. 2 x 50g eggs’ worth of yolk 18g Canola oil 6.7g Coconut milk powder Sold at RedMan in packets of 250g 20.
